spec_data.Name: stonevpn
spec_data.Description:
StoneVPN allows you to manage OpenVPN certificates and create
configurations for Windows and Linux machines based on a
template. It can package everything into a zipfile and mail
it to a user.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 06:53:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Easy OpenVPN certificate and configuration management
